DOC.brief_title: HER2 Circulating Tumor Cells in Gastric Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: We propose to survey the frequency of HER2 (+) CTC in order to lay groundwork for future clinical trials incorporating Her-2 targeted agents in gastric cancer. Blood samples will be collected from metastatic gastric cancer patients.
DOC.criteria: Patients older than 18 years ② Patients with localized, histologically confirmed gastric cancer ③ Informed consent form No informed consent form
